Title: Minami-ke Natsuyasumi
Description:
['Second Minami-ke OVA bundled with the 11th volume of the manga.', '
', '

Chiaki, Kana, and Haruka decide how to spend their last few days of summer together.  Kana struggles to finish her homework.']
